projects.title: Formula 1 Data Analysis
projects.description: Analysis of Formula 1 racing data, including race results, driver performance, and team statistics. Built interactive visualizations to explore racing patterns and team strategies.

projects.title: Airbnb Data Analysis - Amsterdam
projects.description: Comprehensive analysis of Airbnb listings in Amsterdam, exploring pricing trends, location impacts, and seasonal variations. Developed predictive models for price optimization.

projects.title: Automated µFTIR Pipeline
projects.description: Development of an automated pipeline for processing and analyzing µFTIR spectroscopy data. Implemented advanced algorithms for spectral analysis and data processing.
